author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [markdownlint](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint) from 0.11.0 to 0.14.1.
Commits - [`0b9b74c`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/0b9b74ccfd8097340fa354fe394031093da4cfdd) Update to version 0.14.1. - [`608f875`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/608f875fc29f4ea9b6bded03f857d116ef065c42) Update MD033/no-inline-html to better handle inline code spans (fixes [#182](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/182)). - [`f003926`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/f003926a72f8692fd0b65ac669c45c80efded31b) Update MD033/no-inline-html to ignore email autolinks (fixes [#183](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/183)). - [`ad8e400`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/ad8e4007c07678659d9a2fe9339216c219105525) Update to version 0.14.0. - [`3960a4a`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/3960a4a26d50cdd9a80d976abcfd7c8000fd114f) Minor updates for MD047 and to remove a reference to io.js. - [`994903b`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/994903ba883be0a431405f57ea1136122bd6d71d) Update dependencies: eslint to 5.16.0, js-yaml to 3.13.1, typescript to 3.4.5... - [`bb6f9ba`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/bb6f9ba4cd7ad769068e10b266d91b0883d1acfb) Fix .travis.yml after_script to use nyc for coverage reporting. - [`1b8b156`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/1b8b15693f2b02bf2c018863278a9fd39ec0ef66) Replace assign/clone helpers with object spread syntax. - [`684416a`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/684416a902478b826af8e54ea5989a30039ee41d) Improve MD034/no-bare-urls range reporting (fixes [#181](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/issues/181)). - [`dba6d49`](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/commit/dba6d4994b106460e75e413474e93bdcb35d514a) Remove support for end-of-life Node.js version 6. - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/DavidAnson/markdownlint/compare/v0.11.0...v0.14.1)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.11.0&new-version=0.14.1)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=markdownlint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=0.11.0&new-version=0.14.1) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in the `.dependabot/config.yml` file in this repo: - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

title: Build(deps): Bump markdownlint from 0.11.0 to 0.14.1 in /test/common/markdown
